body: Are we sure we always want to require people from specifying a name for the module? Maybe we could have a default implementation of `name()` that uses `typeid(*this).name()` (possibly with a roundtrip through our demangling code)?
body_html: Are we sure we always want to require people from specifying a name for the module? Maybe we could have a default implementation of name() that uses typeid(*this).name() (possibly with a roundtrip through our demangling code)?
